name: Storm the Gates (Canceled)
blurb: Storm the Gates is a new multiplayer turn-based tactical combat game set in a medieval fantasy world playable on PC, Mac, or tablet.

rewards.reward: FOOTSOLDIER TIER:                           \r\n============================== \r\nEarly Access to the Game Beta with a choice of Empire or Marauder Faction starting units.  We also really thank you for supporting our game!

WARRIOR TIER:                  
============================== 
Warrior Army Bundle (3 Gold Army Packs, 3 Silver Army Packs, 6 Bronze Army Packs - $30 VALUE!)
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access

VANGUARD TIER 
============================== 
 Vanguard Army Bundle (5 Gold Army Packs, 6 Silver Army Packs, 7 Bronze Army Packs, 5 Item Packs - $60 VALUE!)  Also comes with a Kickstarter Exclusive Founder’s Crest badge to show that you were a major supporter of the game’s launch.  This Crest also gives a permanent +15% Gold & Xp Boost per game FOR LIFE! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access

CAPTAIN TIER
============================== 
Captain's Army Bundle (6 Gold Army Packs, 7 Silver Army Packs, 7 Bronze Army Packs, 6 Item Packs - $70 VALUE!)  Also includes 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE) for the other Faction, allowing you to PLAY BOTH the Empire and Marauder Factions instead of just one!  In addition, this comes with 2 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION digital cards: 1 Gold-framed War Priest Unit and 1 Gold-framed Orc Taskmaster Unit!  These LIMITED-EDITION versions cannot be earned in-game and can ONLY be earned through Kickstarter!
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Kickstarter Exclusive Founder’s Crest

COMMANDER TIER
============================== 
Commander Army Bundle (14 Gold Army Packs, 12 Silver Army Packs, 10 Bronze Army Packs, 12 Item Packs - $140 VALUE!)  Plus 2 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION digital cards - 1 Gold-framed Pit Troll Rare Unit and 1 Gold-framed Siege Engine Rare Unit.
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Kickstarter Exclusive Founder’s Crest, 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 2 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit

DRAGONTAMER TIER
============================== 
Dragontamer Army Bundle (22 Gold Army Packs, 17 Silver Army Packs, 15 Bronze Army Packs, 22 Item Packs - $220 VALUE!)  Includes 1 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed digital EPIC DRAGON flying unit for the faction of your choice!
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Kickstarter Exclusive Founder’s Crest,  3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 4 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.

WARLORD TIER
============================== 
Warlord Army Bundle (34 Gold Army Packs, 30 Silver Army Packs, 30 Bronze Army Packs, 40 Item Packs - $370 VALUE!)  Includes 1 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed digital Battalion Leader card of your choice: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver!  Leader Cards are EXTREMELY RARE and grant a powerful combat ability for your army on the battlefield!  Also, eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Kickstarter Exclusive Founder’s Crest, 3 Starter Bundles ($30 value), 5 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.

KING TIER
============================== 
For some serious firepower, this includes 1 GOLD “BOOSTER BOX" (+50 Gold Army Packs - $250 VALUE!) and 1 ITEM "BOOSTER BOX" (+50 Item Packs - $100 VALUE!).  In addition, your Founder's Crest will be upgraded to the Kickstarter Exclusive KING'S CREST badge, which gives a permanent +25% Gold & Xp Boost per game FOR LIFE!  Also, eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Warlord Army Bundle ($370 VALUE)!, 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE), 6 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: Choice of 1 Battalion Leader card: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver, 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit

COLLECTOR TIER
============================== 
Includes 1 of EVERY CARD at launch, including the Battalion Leader Cards and the 2 Epic Dragons!  Also comes with 5 Legendary Seal of Destiny  items, which can be used to instantly promote any 1 Unit by one Rank.  Also, eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Warlord Army Bundle ($370 VALUE)!, 1 Gold Booster Box ($250 VALUE!), 1 Item Booster Box ($100 VALUE!), Kickstarter Exclusive King's Crest, 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 6 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: Choice of 1 Battalion Leader card: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver, 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.

MASTER COLLECTOR TIER
============================== 
Includes 3 of EVERY CARD at launch in the Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION GOLD-FRAME (including the Battalion Leader Cards and 2 Epic Dragons)!  Includes 5 Legendary Goblet of Destiny items, which can be used to instantly promote any 1 Unit to Maximum Rank.  Goblet of Destiny items are extraordinarily rare and cannot be found in-game by normal means.  Also, eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Warlord Army Bundle ($370 VALUE)!, 1 Gold Booster Box ($250 VALUE!), 1 Item Booster Box ($100 VALUE!), Kickstarter Exclusive King's Crest, 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 5 Seal of Destiny Items, 6 Kickstarter Limited-Edition Gold-framed Digital Cards: Choice of 1 Battalion Leader card: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver, 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.

EMPEROR TIER
============================== 
Includes 5 of EVERY CARD at launch in the Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION GOLD-FRAME!  Also includes an ELDER GUILD.  The Elder Guild begins with all Guild Tactics (perks) at Max Level and we will paint you a CUSTOM GUILD EMBLEM of your choice exclusive to your Guild!  We also give you 10,000 GEMS that you can divide among your friends/guild-mates, so you can start building the ultimate guild!  In addition, your King's Crest will be upgraded to the Kickstarter Exclusive EMPEROR'S CREST badge, which gives a permanent +35% Gold & Xp Boost per game FOR LIFE!  Also, eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Warlord Army Bundle ($370 VALUE)!, 1 Gold Booster Box ($250 VALUE!), 1 Item Booster Box ($100 VALUE!), Kickstarter Exclusive King's Crest, 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 5 Legendary Goblet of Destiny Items, 5 Seal of Destiny Items, 6 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: Choice of 1 Battalion Leader card: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver, 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.

DOMINION MASTER TIER 
============================== 
Includes 5 of EVERY CARD at launch in the Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION GOLD-FRAME!  Also, we include 1 of EVERY EXPANSION CARD we released FOR LIFE (also in LIMITED-EDITION GOLD-FRAME)!  We will also paint a Kickstarter Exclusive CUSTOM PLAYER PORTRAIT icon for you, exclusive to you only!  Also you will appear with SPECIAL RECOGNITION IN THE CREDITS!  Also, eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Elder Guild with Custom Guild Emblem & 10,000 Guild Gems, Kickstarter Exclusive Emperor's Crest, Warlord Army Bundle ($370 VALUE)!, 1 Gold Booster Box ($250 VALUE!), 1 Item Booster Box ($100 VALUE!), 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 5 Legendary Goblet of Destiny Items, 5 Seal of Destiny Items, 6 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: Choice of 1 Battalion Leader card: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver, 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.

AVATAR OF IMMORTALS TIER
============================== 
Includes 5 of EVERY CARD at launch in the Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION GOLD-FRAME!  Also, we include 5 of EVERY EXPANSION CARD we released FOR LIFE (also in LIMITED-EDITION GOLD-FRAME)!  Also, MEET THE TEAM behind Storm the Gates either in person or by phone!  Also you will be IMMORTALIZED IN A LEADER CARD of a Faction of your choice for future expansions!  Also, you can also help decide on the next expansion for the game!  You are responsible for your own transportation to Rebel Entertainment.  Eligible for ALL stretch goal bonuses! 
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES:
============================== 
Beta Game Access, Custom Player Portrait Icon, Name in Credits, Elder Guild with Custom Guild Emblem & 10,000 Guild Gems, Kickstarter Exclusive Emperor's Crest, Warlord Army Bundle ($370 VALUE)!, 1 Gold Booster Box ($250 VALUE!), 1 Item Booster Box ($100 VALUE!), 3 Starter Bundles ($30 VALUE!), 5 Legendary Goblet of Destiny Items, 5 Seal of Destiny Items, 6 Kickstarter LIMITED-EDITION Gold-framed Digital Cards: Choice of 1 Battalion Leader card: General Alastor or Gilgamesh the Deceiver, 1 Epic Dragon Unit, 1 Pit Troll Unit, 1 Siege Engine Unit, 1 War Priest Unit, 1 Orc Taskmaster Unit.
